snippet.title: Catopia: Rush Global Launch Trailer - Cat Action RPG Out Now on Android and iOS
snippet.description:
The anticipated Cat RPG, Catopia: Rush, is available now! Build a team of one Hero cat and three other allies to tackle dangerous dungeons in action-packed gameplay! Save the kingdom of Catopia from the wicked Dark Lord! Restore the kingdom through engaging idle systems! Strengthen heroes through equipment and talent upgrades! The game is playable in 15 languages. 

#Cats #Android #iOS #MobileGame #Catopia #CatopiaRush 

New features are available in the 1.0.0 update! 
Super Pass Season 4: New Character Roy
Hard Mode for Chapter 1
Friendly Match PVP - Click a player in the leaderboards to battle their team!
Updated point system! Gain more points for attack accuracy.
Performance optimizations
Bug fixes 

Download Catopia: Rush now! 
Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.supercolony.catopia
Apple App Store - https://apps.apple.com/app/catopia-rush/id1481412678

Read the Catopia University Webcomic on either Tapas or Webtoon
Tapas - https://tapas.io/series/Catopia-University
Webtoon - https://www.webtoons.com/en/challenge/catopia-university/list?title_no=596745

Don't forget to leave us feedback and follow our socials!
https://www.supercolony.com/
https://www.facebook.com/catopiarush
https://twitter.com/CatopiaRush
https://www.instagram.com/catopiarush/
https://discord.gg/htzGu6h2AB

*Game details are subject to change*
